public static int sort(int[]a,int l,int r) {

    if(l==r){
        return 0;
    }

    int mid = (l + r) / 2;
    int al = sort(a, l, mid);
    int ar = sort(a, mid + 1, r);

    if (al == -1 || ar == -1) {
        return -1;
    }

    // Compute left min and max
    int leftMin = a[l];
    int leftMax = a[mid];
    for (int i = l; i <= mid; i++) {
        leftMin = Math.min(leftMin, a[i]);
        leftMax = Math.max(leftMax, a[i]);
    }

    // Compute right min and max
    int rightMin = a[mid+1];
    int rightMax = a[r];
    for (int i = mid+1; i <= r; i++) {
        rightMin = Math.min(rightMin, a[i]);
        rightMax = Math.max(rightMax, a[i]);
    }

    boolean canNoSwap = leftMax <= rightMin;
    boolean canSwap = rightMax <= leftMin;

    int swapsNoSwap = al + ar;
    int swapsSwap = al + ar + 1;

    if (canNoSwap && canSwap) {
        return Math.min(swapsNoSwap, swapsSwap);
    } else if (canNoSwap) {
        return swapsNoSwap;
    } else if (canSwap) {
        return swapsSwap;
    } else {
        return -1;
    }
}
